definition: the first time/for the first time
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: It was the first time I saw you blush.
sentences.chinese: 那是我頭一回看見你臉紅。

sentences.english: This being a first, he approached the door cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 這是頭一回聽到敲門聲，雷利小心翼翼地打開門。

sentences.english: For the first time in a while, social media is a two-horse race.
sentences.chinese: 幾年來，社交媒體領域頭一回開始了雙龍爭霸的局面。

sentences.english: I first encountered this when fishing on a friend's power boat.
sentences.chinese: 頭一回趕上這種事兒是在搭朋友的汽艇釣魚時。

sentences.english: Ya'll act like you never seen a white person before .
sentences.chinese: 你們一個個都表現得象是頭一回見到白人一樣。

sentences.english: Now she heard of pain-killer for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 她頭一回聽說止痛藥這個名詞。

sentences.english: This year wasn't the first time Balliet tried to quit. But before, she'd always failed.
sentences.chinese: 今年並非貝利葉頭一回戒菸，但以前她總是失敗。

sentences.english: But this time researchers achieved a first in another sense - making an object vanish in all three dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 而此次讓物體從三個維度都“消失”卻是頭一回。

sentences.english: Now she heard of Pain-killer for the first time. She ordered a lot at once.
sentences.chinese: 她頭一回聽說止痛藥這個名詞，現在就派上了用場。
